definitions.definition: To restrict ; to circumscribe; not to allow to go beyond a certain bound , to set boundaries .
examples: We need to limit the power of the executive.
I'm limiting myself to two drinks tonight.

definitions.definition: To have a limit in a particular set.
examples: The sequence limits on the point a .

definitions.definition: To beg , or to exercise functions , within a certain limited region.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To restrict ; to circumscribe; not to allow to go beyond a certain bound , to set boundaries .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics , intransitive ) To have a limit in a particular set.
( obsolete ) To beg , or to exercise functions , within a certain limited region.
